item.title: CVE-2023-51666|2024-06-27T19:37:28.331Z -- pickplugins -- related%20post
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in PickPlugins Related Post allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Related Post: from n/a through 2.0.53.
